fields.title: Little Monster Letterman
fields.description: Some description of how dope this letterman is. It’s the perfect elevated high school look for bullying the kid at the locker next door for his lunch money.
fields.sizeFit: All products are oversized. We recommend purchasing the size you would normally wear or one size smaller for proper fit.
fields.details: 100% Cotton. All additions made with 100% organic cotton sourced from sustainable cotton farms that minimize pesticide use and pay workers livable wages.
fields.care: For minor blemishes, spot clean and let air dry. If necessary, machine wash warm with low spin cycle and specialized detergent. Let air dry.
